---
title: from_velocyto_to_h5mu
---

Convert a velocyto .loom file to h5mu


## Argument help

Run the following command to view the module's help page:
```bash
nextflow run openpipelines-bio/openpipeline -r main_build -main-script target/nextflow/convert/from_velocyto_to_h5mu/main.nf --help
```

### Arguments



:::{.column-body-outset}
|Name       |Description                |Attributes                            |
|:----------|:--------------------------|:-------------------------------------|
|`--input`  |Input velocyto .loom file. |file, required, example: "input.loom" |
|`--output` |Output h5mu file.          |file, example: "output.h5mu"          |
:::
